strategy: Deathwatch armies have a Strategy Rating of 5.
Initiative: Planetary Defense Force Formations have an Initiative Rating of 3+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on Ordo Xenos with Deathwatch allies

formations.name: 0-1 Officio Assassinorum
formations.units: Once per battle, during an Assault that the Deathwatch player initiated (after all units have finished moving), a single unit anywhere in the enemy formation(s) is hit with D3 hits. These hits counts as being from CC, and have the 'Sniper' and 'First Strike' special rules. Any damage caused by these hits counts towards combat resolution (unless the target is Super-Expendable).

formations.name: 0-1 Ordo Xenos Inquisitor Retinue
formations.units: Ordo Xenos Inquisitor, nine Arbitrators, five Arbites Repressors
extraUnits: Add three Leman Russ Thunderers: 125 points

formations.name: Deathwatch Kill-Team
formations.units: One Watch Sergeant, four Deathwatch Tacticals plus transport
extraUnits: Replace two Deathwatch Tacticals with two Deathwatch Black Shields: Free
Replace two Deathwatch Tacticals with two Deathwatch Devastators: 25 points

sections.name: Deathwatch Support Detachments
sections.description: One Deathwatch Support Detachment may be taken per Deathwatch Core Detachment

formations.name: Deathwatch Terminators
formations.units: One Watch Sergeant, two Deathwatch Terminators

formations.name: Deathwatch Attack
formations.units: One Watch Sergeant, two Deathwatch Land Speeders, four Assault Bikes

formations.name: Deathwatch Vanguard
formations.units: One Watch Sergeant, four Vanguard Assault Veterans

sections.name: Planetary Defense Force Formations
sections.description: Two Planetary Defence Force Formations may be taken per Deathwatch Core Formation.

formations.name: Planetary Defense Platoon
formations.units: Six PDF Conscripts, three Land Transporters
extraUnits: Replace three Land Transporters with three Thudd Guns or two Heavy AA Guns: 25 points

sections.name: Deathwatch Navy Detachments
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on Deathwatch Navy Detachments

upgrades.title: Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: Land Raiders
items.description: Add enough Deathwatch Land Raiders or Land Raider Crusaders to transport the formation

items.name: Deathwatch Specialists
items.description: Add a Chaplain or Librarian to a INF unit.

items.name: 0-1 Inquisitor Lord
items.description: Replace an Ordo Xenos Inquisitor with an Ordo Xenos Inquisitor Lord
